verses.verse: I will give you thanks <WH3034> with my whole heart. <WH3820> Before the gods, <WH430> I will sing praises to you. <WH2167>

I will bow <WH7812> down toward your holy <WH6944> temple, <WH1964> and give thanks <WH3034> to your Name <WH8034> for your loving kindness <WH2617> and for your truth; <WH571> for you have exalted <WH1431> your Name <WH8034> and your Word above all. <WH565>
In the day <WH3117> that I called, <WH7121> you answered <WH6030> me. <WH7292> You encouraged me with strength <WH5797> in my soul. <WH5315>
All the kings <WH4428> of the earth <WH776> will give you thanks, <WH3034> Yahweh, <WH3068> for they have heard <WH8085> the words <WH561> of your mouth. <WH6310>
Yes, <WH7891> they will sing of the ways <WH1870> of Yahweh; <WH3068> for great <WH1419> is Yahweh <WH3068>'s glory. <WH3519>
For though Yahweh <WH3068> is high, <WH7311> yet he looks <WH7200> after the lowly; <WH8217> but the proud, <WH1364> he knows <WH3045> from afar. <WH4801>

Though I walk <WH3212> in the midst <WH7130> of trouble, <WH6869> you will revive <WH2421> me. <WH7971> You will stretch forth your hand <WH3027> against the wrath <WH639> of my enemies. <WH341> Your right hand <WH3225> will save me. <WH3467>

Yahweh <WH3068> will fulfill <WH1584> that which concerns me; <WH2617> your loving kindness, Yahweh, <WH3068> endures forever. <WH5769> Don't <WH7503> forsake the works <WH4639> of your own hands. <WH3027>
